name: Potatoes and Corn Soup
author: Soraya Sanchez
summary: I made up this recipe when I had none of the ingredients I needed! Your family will love this one, and you'll be able to make something else while this is cooking. Great with breadsticks! Serve alone, with a dollop of sour cream, or some grated cheese and pepper.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
directions: In a large pot, place the potatoes, celery and leaves, and onion
Pour in enough water to cover
Remove the celery leaves, and stir in the bouillon cubes until dissolved
Reduce heat to medium-low, and cook 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender
Mix the chives into the pot, and continue cooking 5 minutes before serving
